provider.name: Cerebras
provider.description: The Cerebras API offers developers a low-latency solution for AI model inference powered by Cerebras Wafer-Scale Engines and CS-3 systems.

models.title: Chat Completions
models.description: Portkey supports the chat completions API for Cerebras models

features.title: Tool Calling
features.description: Cerebras API endpoints support tool use for programmatic execution of specified operations through requests with explicitly defined operations

portkeyPythonSDK.description: Use Portkey Python SDK to make text calls to Cerebras chat completions models
portkeyPythonSDK.codeExample: sample python code for llama3.1-8b text call on Cerebras

integrationViaVirtualKey.description: Integrate Cerebras using Portkey's virtual key system

inline.text: Get your API key from Cerebras and add it to Portkey to create a virtual key.
inline.description: You can get your Cerebras API key from the Cerebras website [here](https://cerebras.ai/).

portkeyPythonSDK.description: Initialize Portkey with the virtual key in Python
portkeyPythonSDK.codeExample: sample python SDK code for llama3.1-8b chat completions call on Cerebras using virtual key

portkeyNodeSDK.description: Initialize Portkey with the virtual key in Node.js
portkeyNodeSDK.codeExample: sample node.js SDK code for llama3.1-8b chat completions call on Cerebras using virtual key

restAPI.description: Use Portkey's REST API to make text calls to Cerebras chat completions models like Llama3.1-8b
restAPI.codeExample: sample rest api code for llama3.1-8b chat completions call on Cerebras using virtual key
